enhanced_description: Monjin is positioned as the world's first interviewer network and a pioneering people assessment video platform. It leverages a global network of experienced domain experts who serve as interview panelists. The platform boasts a vetted database containing over 50,000 assessed video interviews. Monjin's core offering includes scheduling real video interviews worldwide, precisely matching based on skills, role, and experience. These interviews can be accessed, assessed, and experienced remotely from anywhere, at any time, significantly enhancing recruitment efficiency and quality. Monjin aims to reduce hiring costs and time by up to 68%, connecting talents and recruiters through a streamlined interviewing process. It offers features like enhanced communication, higher selection probability, and privacy settings allowing users to control who can view their profile and interviews. Monjin also supports an interviewer empanelment program for certified interviewers.
